Dear Bernardina Piratini, July 26, 1838.

I am already delayed in receiving news from you and the arrival of our children; God willing it is not due to health inconveniences.

My head is a little better; but I am quite troubled by lice and scabies, which is indeed what I was missing.

Regards to all our family, embraces to our children, and you receive the heart of yours, Almeida.
